page.title: 10Employment in rural Sowerby
page.content: There is full employment in this block, as the only housing available is connected with employment. All the employment is associated with farming, with extra helpers being brought in at busy times, such as clearing poultry houses, potato picking and grain harvest. The farmers' wives too earn extra pocket money on the farms at these times. One or two farms in the block take in "Bed and Breakfast" visitors, and this too provides employment for farmers' wives, as well as some welcome extra income.
